descriptionHtml:
Speed Bows
by mdczer


-----------
Description
-----------

This mods adds recipes and temper recipes for faster drawing bows.  They draw 1.5 times faster, weigh 1.5 times less, and do half (or slightly less than half) their normal damage.  Same ingredients for their recipes and the monetary value is also the same.  Speed bows should be craftable with their associated perk.  With the Quick Shot perk, you can deal damage incredibly fast.

All items and recipes are new, so they should not conflict with any other mod. They use default meshes, so any texture replacer you have should work with them.


Examples:  

Daedric Bow-----------DMG 20--WGT 19--SPD .5
Daedric Speed Bow---DMG 10--WGT 12--SPD .75

Dwarven Bow-----------DMG 12--WGT 10--SPD .75
Dwarven Speed Bow---DMG 6--WGT 7--SPD 1.125

Long Bow-----------DMG 6   WGT 5  SPD 1
Long Speed Bow---DMG 3 WGT 3.3 SPD 1.5


-------------------------
Speed bows recipes added:
-------------------------

Daedric Speed Bow
Draugr Speed Bow
Supple Draugr Speed Bow (Advanced Armors perk required)
Dwarven Speed Bow
Ebony Speed Bow
Elven Speed Bow
Falmer Speed Bow
Supple Falmer Speed Bow (Advanced Armors perk required)
Forsworn Speed Bow
Glass Speed Bow
Hunting Speed Bow
Imperial Speed Bow
Long Speed Bow
Nightingale Speed Bow (Unenchanted and Available after appropriate quest)
Nord Hero Speed Bow (Available when you are able to craft other Skyforge stuff)
Orcish Speed Bow
Dragonbone Speed Bow
Auriel\'s Speed Bow (Unenchanted and available after appropriate quest)



If there are any problems PM me or let me know in the comments.
author: mdczer
